articles.title: Cricket great slams Albo’s beer tax freeze
articles.description: Australian cricket great David Warner has slammed Prime Minister Anthony Albanese’s move to combat soaring beer prices stating it’s simply “too late”.
articles.content:
Australian cricket great David Warner has slammed Prime Minister Anthony Albanese’s move to combat soaring beer prices stating it’s simply “too late”.
